EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
VESSEL, 100 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
IN 33-29N 011-56E. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
